title: Top 15 Defensive Prospects in the NFL Draft and Draft Rumors (Ep. 258) | GM Street (Ep. 258)
description:
The Ringer’s Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier continue through NFL draft week, discussing the rumor that the Cleveland Brown’s will take Baker Mayfield with the no. 1 pick (04:15) and other rumors surrounding the draft (9:15). Then they dive into their top 15 prospects on the defensive side of the ball (24:45).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
